name: Avantcom International Sdn. Bhd.
description: Operator of a homegrown brand intended to offer halal personal care products. The company specializes in skincare and cosmetics enabling it to offer all-natural, non-inflammatory, non-toxic, and effective ingredients to address various skin concerns, enabling consumers to get quality skincare products.
